name: WKUserScript
desc: A WKUserScript object represents a script that can be injected into a webpage.

items.name: injectionTime
items.desc: The time when the script should be injected into the webpage.

items.name: isForMainFrameOnly
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the script should be injected only into the main frame (true) or into all frames (false).

items.name: WKUserScriptInjectionTime
items.desc: The time when a user script should be injected into a webpage.

items.name: s WKUserContentController
items.desc: A WKUserContentController object provides a way for JavaScript to post messages and inject user scripts to a web view.

items.name: s WKScriptMessage
items.desc: A WKScriptMessage object contains information about a message sent from a webpage.

items.name: ocol WKScriptMessageHandler
items.desc: A class conforming to the WKScriptMessageHandler protocol provides a method for receiving messages from JavaScript running in a webpage.
